basics.name: Dr. Sagar Hosangadi Prutvi
basics.label: Data Scientist | Research Engineer
basics.summary:
Welcome to my online portfolio!
I am currently a Post-Doctoral researcher at Universität Freiburg.
I hold a Ph.D., from the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology Bombay (IIT-B) and bring rich expertise in the fascinating field of Tribo-electric Nanogenerators (TENG) and electromechanical devices.

Along with a wealth of Research & Development activities, I have 7 years of professional experience. My diverse skill set encompass Data Science, Mechanical, Electrical and Electronics engineering , as well as proficient coding abilities. These enable me to tackle intricate multidisciplinary challenges with finesse.

Explore my portfolio to see my work in action. If any of my skills, projects or expertise resonate with you,
let's connect, collaborate and create something remarkable together.

education.area: Triboelectric effect driven self powered vibration sensors and wind energy harvesting for enabling industry 4.0

education.institution: National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal (India)
Dr. Ambedkar Institute of Technology Bengaluru (India)

work.summary: Worked as an A.V.P. to implement Data science initiatives for process improvements
highlights: Generating analytical & data science solutions to enhance processes and guide business decisions.
Designed and developed an end-to-end client ranking solution to automate the auditing process.

work.summary: Executive in Data Science Services group
highlights: Developing various Machine learning models (Regression/classification/NLP/anamoly detection/failure prediction).
Designing and optimizing High level architecture for ML model development, deployment and consumption.
Supporting company outreach activities by preparing technical abstracts for conferences.
Translating business needs into Data Science problem statements.

work.summary: Translated the designers idea into an engineered product
highlights: Majorly contributed to the designing of small-scale wind turbine (Zeintein).
Understanding the mechanism and their kinetics.
Translating rough sketches into CAD models for engineering analysis.
Complete ownership of small scale wind turbines.

work.summary: Technical analysis for a leg prosthetic
highlights: Created pivotal documents for fund raising and outreach activities.
Performed GAIT analysis, static, dynamic and failure analysis of KAFO (knee Foot Ankle Orthosis).
Actively involved in design optimization by utilizing DFx concepts (manufacturability, assembly and end-use).

work.summary: Here, my majority of the responsibilities were:
highlights: Providing CAD Support in the product development activities of Ion Implanters (client: Varian Semiconductor Equipments).
Creating engineering drawings for sheetmetal parts, solid parts and electrical harnesses.

Electrical harness were major area of focus, where i took complete ownership of schematic drawing, routing path optimization, wiring optimization and developing final flatboard drawings for final assembly.
